articles.description: Former Love Island star Liberty Poole attended the ITV bash with her Dancing On Ice partner Joe Johnson, and looked spectacular in a black figure-hugging dress that featured a dramatic sequinned train
articles.content:
Love Island s Liberty Poole sparked rumours of a rift as she partied away from her fellow Islanders at the ITV Palooza.

articles.title: Gary Barlow reveals Take That WILL reunite in 2022 - but Jason Orange won't be returning - Daily Mail
